pwa_block.title: Progressive Web Apps (PWA) – The New In Thing
pwa_block.description:
Progressive web apps using Magento bring “a lot” to all of these- user experience and engagement, speed, reliability, and conversions.

PWA loads instantly even when there are network issues and this helps the store with improved customer experience.

PWA offers superfast navigation and smooth user interactions

PWA eliminates the need to launch the app on app stores

Lastly, PWA is part of the product road-map of Magento

pwa_block.title: Android & iOS-based Magento Mobile Apps
pwa_block.description: We build scalable, highly secured, and eminent Magento mobile apps that work well on iOS and Android to enhance customer experience.

acf.title: Magento Mobile App Turns Your Business into a Million Dollar Brand
acf.description:
We develop fully functional and customized Magento mobile apps that help you retain your existing customers, attract new ones, and boost your revenue while offering a smoother shopping experience.

With Magento mobile application, you give reason to your users to visit your store repeatedly and buy more. It helps increasing customer loyalty. This help you in taking your web commerce store to a level where it is not easy for your competitors to surpass.
acf.heading_title:
What it takes to make a Magento mobile
application move swiftly?

magento_mobile_application_block.title: Excellent mobile app UI improves user navigation and sales
Mobile transactions are super-fast and highly-secured
Checkout process becomes easy, quick and intuitive
As the cart here is persistent, the cart abandonment rate reduces drastically
Customer support services are just a click away
Personalized customer engagement happens using push notifications
Customers can reach to the product page directly as deep linking here removes any kind of unwanted navigational steps.
